name: (Not So) Smart City
description: An experiment in writing an academic paper using Markdown and generating a finished document using various Web technologies. The paper itself looks at the history of design approaches and examines up-and-coming fields of human-information interaction and information design. It takes methods from those fields and applies them to analyzing information needs in the context of travel.
